name: DungeonCoin
description:
The main character is the adventurer who went down to the dungeon to collect coins. You have only dungeon in which you must collect coins and put it in the trunk of short time until the evil monsters you catch are not selected earned by honest labor or the dungeon will collapse.

Advantages of the game:

- Unique art design
- Test your greed
- Exclusive system of potions and bonuses for the player
- Funny monsters who want to chase you
- Dynamic gameplay
- Unique musical accompaniment

Art - https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii
Background - https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-fairy-tale-2d-backgrounds
